text:
When this is all rolled out, will we have the ability to create custom templates for the "Drag-n-Drop" email styles, along with some predefined styles?
Kind of similar to how in a coded template we can drop in a `<style type="text/css" data-hse-inline-css="true"> ... </style>`?
based on what <@U24DCSJBE> has said in the past, basically yes.

I thought that was the case. Will be exciting to use this new feature.

Had to explain to a client again recently, that to get a similar experience to using a `Flexible Column` block as on webpages/landingpages, the easiest  solution is to build a highly customized custom module.
They just didn't understand that a `Flexible Column` block "is not supported in email templates cause HubSpot says so" lol
heh, yeah Iâ€™ve been in the same boat many times

<@U24DCSJBE> client has a very valid question, how do you set a background color for 1 block in the dnd email builder.

I could give them some html to pull it off but that seems like the wrong way to encourage  them to do it
